Name: Matt DeKrey
AboutMe: I'm currently a coding architect, working remotely from Dallas, TX, working mostly with the consulting firm Hero Digital. (Previously, I've developed WCF web services including Mountain Dew's DEWmocracy, Game Fuel, and Honor the Code; the Pepsi account management system; and the Pepsi Product Facts website.) My personal projects have led me through WPF, WF, WinRT, DNX, and many others. I've toyed a bit with Xamarin and MonoGame. I've also worked extensively with AngularJS, and a bit with KnockoutJS. I have also occasionally worked with PHP.
